identity.mission: Transform a basic HTML portal into a premium, native-feeling mobile app experience.
principles: Fusion: Finance precision meets Consumer App fluidity.
Emotion: Trust and Clarity. Dark mode should feel 'expensive', not just dark.
Content: Salaries are the hero. Make them look like digital banknotes/receipts.
Zoom In: Small, crisp details. High density information without clutter.

bottom_nav.description: Fixed bottom bar with 4 tabs. Active state has a subtle glow.

features: Dashed line separator between summary and details

chat_interface.input_area: Fixed above bottom nav, glassmorphism background

instructions_to_main_agent: REWRITE portal.html completely. Do not patch the existing code.
Use the provided Color Palette and Typography.
Implement the 'Bottom Navigation' logic using JavaScript to switch between sections (Home, Salaries, Chat, Profile).
Replace all Emojis with the provided SVG icons.
Use 'IBM Plex Sans Arabic' for all text.
Make the 'Salaries' section the most visually distinct part (High contrast numbers).
Add a 'Glassmorphism' effect to the Header and Bottom Nav.
Ensure all interactive elements have `data-testid` attributes.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Do not use gradients for backgrounds unless specified (use solid dark colors).
Use 2-3x more padding than usual. Let the content breathe.
Micro-interactions: Add transition: all 0.2s ease to buttons and cards.
Never center text in cards unless it's a specific stat. Align Right for RTL.
